backend/main.mo: Defines core backend data types for products, retailers, listings, applications, analytics, and user profiles in a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summary of multiple frontend files describing layout, pages, hooks, assets, and styling updates.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring global providers, error boundary, theming, cart context, and router.
frontend/src/components/admin/DangerZone: Admin UI card allowing a full system wipe with confirmation dialog, success state, and logout flow.
frontend/src/components/admin/ListingEdi: Dialog for creating or editing product listings with pricing, stock, status, and promo controls using listing-related hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog for creating or editing products with fields, image upload, category management, and form submission.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerEd: Dialog for creating or editing retailers, handling contact info, address, province, and opening hours.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerHo: Editor component for managing weekly retailer hours and holiday overrides with toggles and time inputs.
frontend/src/components/admin/Searchable: Reusable searchable dropdown select using a popover and command list to pick options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Empty placeholder component for future admin initialization logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Displays an alert indicating admin features are unavailable due to missing backend implementation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Shows a loading overlay during Internet Identity login or first-time actor initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for initial user profile creation with inputs and validation before saving.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Gatekeeper component that checks admin status and blocks access with an error card if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAppr: Gates content based on admin or approval status and shows an approval request flow if the user is not approved.
Restricts access to approved drivers, showing application, pending, or rejection states unless the user is an admin.
Blocks access to shopper-only pages unless approved, showing prompts for applying, pending review, or rejection details.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Ensures the user is authenticated, rendering a login prompt when no identity is present.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandImage: Image component that swaps to styled fallback placeholders when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: Global error boundary that catches runtime and unhandled promise errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/Unexpecte: UI screen showing error details with options to reload or return home.
frontend/src/components/shop/cart/CartPr: Provides a React context for cart items with add, remove, update, and persistence via localStorage.
frontend/src/components/shop/catalog/use: Manages catalog search, category filtering, and price sorting with memoized filtered results.
frontend/src/components/shop/CataloguePr: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
Displays footer with copyright info and a link attribution.
Renders the main shop header with navigation, authentication-aware links, and cart badge.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopLanding: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
Wraps pages with shop header/footer and manages dialogs for auth initialization, town setup, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/towns/DefaultTow: Dialog UI for selecting and setting a user's default town, with loading states and mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Provides admin APIs to list all orders and update order status, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Fetches the global product catalogue using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategories.ts: Fetches and merges frequent and backend categories, and provides a mutation to create new categories.
Manages driver application queries and mutations, including submission with uploaded KYC blobs.
frontend/src/hooks/useDriverOrders.ts: Lists eligible driver orders with polling using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureDefaultTownO: Stub hook that checks default town and logs skipping auto-assignment until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading identities and exposing login/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useListings.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing CRUD operations and cache invalidation tied to product, retailer, and catalog data.
frontend/src/hooks/useNomaYini.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Contains hooks for listing, fetching, and creating orders, including delivery and payment handling with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePickupPointApplica: Implements hooks for submitting and retrieving pickup point applications and status with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Supplies hooks for product listing, retrieval, creation, and updates, with cache coordination across product, catalog, and category queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Holds approval- and admin-related hooks for checking approval status, requesting approval, and managing user approvals.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetailerPortal.ts: Defines hooks for fetching retailer-specific data including profile, inventory, and orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetailers.ts: Provides retailer CRUD hooks and related query invalidations for retailer data.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleApplications.t: Includes hooks for managing shopper, pickup point, and driver role applications with approve/reject mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopperApplication: Hooks for fetching shopper application/status and submitting a new application with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopperOrders.ts: Hooks to list eligible/assigned orders, fetch order details, and accept or complete shopper orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useSystemSettings.ts: Provides a placeholder mutation for system wipe that currently throws and clears query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTownMembership.ts: Stubbed hooks for town membership queries and mutations, all disabled until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useTowns.ts: Stubbed town management hooks for listing, creating, updating, and removing towns, pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfiles.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles, including caller and specific user profiles via actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark mode color variables and base component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDriversPag: Admin UI page for viewing, approving, and rejecting driver applications with dialogs and table views.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManageList: Provides an interface to search, create, edit, and delete product–retailer listings with status badges and dialogs for editing and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders with filtering, detail dialogs, and tools to update order status including assignment to shoppers or drivers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPickupPoin: Manages pickup point applications, allowing admins to view details, approve, or reject applications with reasons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Enables search, creation, and editing of products in the global catalogue, with a product list and an edit dialog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRetailersP: Handles listing, searching, creation, editing, and deletion of retailer records with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Shows system settings placeholders and includes a danger zone section for wiping system data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminShoppersPa: Displays and manages shopper applications, allowing admins to view details, approve, or reject applicants with reasons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTownApplic: Static page explaining that town applications are no longer needed and providing navigation back to the admin dashboard.
Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and removing towns, with form handling and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/shop/AdminDashboardPa: Admin dashboard linking to management pages for shoppers, drivers, pickup points, retailers, and products.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page showing cart items, quantity controls, totals, and actions to clear the cart or proceed.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CataloguePage.ts: Catalogue browser with search, product listing, and add‑to‑cart functionality using global catalogue data.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including delivery options, payment type, validation, and order submission with success and empty-cart states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DriverApplicatio: Provides a driver application form with validation, selfie upload, and submission while handling existing applications and errors.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DriverDashboardP: Displays eligible delivery orders for drivers with status badges, formatting helpers, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/JoinUsPage.tsx: Landing page linking to applications for driver, shopper, and pickup point roles, plus application status access.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MasterAdminRoleA: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Shows a customer’s order history with status badges, totals, and navigation to order details, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MyTownsPage.tsx: Lets users manage favorite towns, add or remove towns, and view default and additional towns with validation and dialogs.
Displays detailed order info, including status, delivery method, payment, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/PickupPointAppli: Form page for submitting a pickup point application with image upload, validation, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/shop/PickupPointDashb: Placeholder dashboard for pickup point users with basic UI and future feature notice.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProvinceListPage: Landing-style page showing hero content and platform features with optional CTA based on login state.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerDashboar: Retailer dashboard displaying retailer info, inventory stats, and listing details with loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerOrderTra: Displays retailer-related orders with status badges, loading/error handling, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RoleApplications: Displays the user’s shopper, pickup point, and driver application statuses, showing badges and detailed messages for each state.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ShopperApplicati: Provides a form for submitting a shopper application with selfie upload, validation, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ShopperDashboard: Shows available and assigned shopper orders, with actions to accept or complete orders and view details.
frontend/src/pages/shop/TownSuburbListPa: Empty file with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/router/HashRouter.tsx: Defines the app’s route structure, authentication gates, and page mappings using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlobUrl.ts: Safely extracts a direct URL from an ExternalBlob with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytes.ts: Converts files to byte arrays and validates image file type and size.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats, parses, and validates ZAR currency values.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Provides helpers for selecting product images, generating URLs, and checking image limits.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds deployment-safe URLs for public assets using Vite’s base URL.
frontend/src/utils/saProvinces.ts: Exports a list and type of all South African provinces.
frontend/src/utils/themeAssets.ts: Defines theme image asset paths resolved through publicAssetUrl.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats IC timestamp bigints into readable date or date-time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL params (query or hash), storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from session or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current app state, incremental build constraints, existing features, and pending feature requests for the pickup‑point workflow.
